text.section: The secretary may promulgate administrative regulations not inconsistent with the provisions of 1974 Acts ch. 74.

The Transportation Cabinet shall adopt such administrative regulations and procedures consistent with the provisions of KRS 56.610 to 56.760 as it deems necessary or appropriate to carry out the provisions of KRS 56.610 to 56.760 with regard to requirements of the Department of Highways as provided for in KRS Chapters 175, 176, 177 and 180.

law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, sec. 15.
